articles.author: CNN Worldwide
articles.title: Study: Most Americans 'resigned' to COVID future - KSLA
articles.description: According to a Kaiser Family Foundation survey published Tuesday, 79% of adults believe COVID will continue at a low level, like the flu, and we’ll have to live with it for the foreseeable future.
articles.content:
(CNN) Most Americans expect a future with COVID-19.
According to a Kaiser Family Foundation survey published Tuesday, 79% of adults believe COVID will continue at a low level, like the flu, and well… [+535 chars]
